title: There's a reason why no one plays Yasuo in LCS
body: Because he's trash. Even before his nerfs he literally never got played.

replies.body: Actually he was time to time.

> [{quoted}](name=Ńø Çígâr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8beXr4IX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-12T19:48:28.000+0000)
>
> Actually he was time to time.

Apparently you didn't do well in English. If you read my post it's clearly present tense. And even in the past he was only played in like 2 or 3 games. Nothing to write home about.
> Because he's trash._ Even before his nerfs he** literally never **got played._

> [{quoted}](name=Ńø Çígâr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8beXr4IX,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-13T00:48:23.693+0000)
>
> 

The circlejerk is strong in this thread. It was an exaggeration. Obviously he got played a couple times, but he barely saw any play at all.

And once again in the OP I'm clearly speaking in the present tense. The past is completely irrelevant.

Yasuo doesn't get played often in the LCS because of a few different reasons. He either denies your team an AP mid or a tanky top, which is only partially offset by a potential jg pick. In other words, unless he's bringing a lot to the table, he's simply crowded out by the competitive metagame.
For your safety, I'd advise you to avoid saying these things. Boards are probably going to butcher you with downvotes.

> [{quoted}](name=XTRMN00B1337,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8beXr4IX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-12T19:48:47.829+0000)
>
> For your safety, I'd advise you to avoid saying these things. Boards are probably going to butcher you with downvotes.

That reminds me. Speaking of boards, this is all thank to you! You're the reason he's trash!
